page.title: 12ST.LAWRENCE PARISH CHURCH 2
page.content: Every Sunday and throughout the week people of all ages arrive to worship. Some leave their cars in the nearby car park, others walk. There are usually 3 services- 8am Communion, 10am Family Service and 6.30pm Evensong. A rota of volunteers look after small babies to allow families to attend. Sometimes there is a visiting preacher. The nearby church hall is a lively meeting place, daytime and evenings and during weekends, for different ages and interests. There are clubs for older, retired people, young families, Mother's Union, badminton and bingo. Committees of volunteer parishoners organise rotas for flower displays, steward helpers, church cleaners and various fund raising events, for example, Christmas fair and regular coffee mornings.
